Tool

NameDisconnect from PostgreSQL
ID2
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013

Description

Disconnect PostgreSQL data source.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Options
HostTextPG_HOSTPassword
PortIntegerPG_PORTMinimum: 0 Default: 5432
DatabaseTextPG_NAMEDatabase Name
UserTextPG_USERUser Name
PasswordTextPG_PWDPassword
TransactionsChoiceTRANSACTAvailable Choices: [0] rollback [1] commit Default: 1
